readtext 0.76

  • Reference

encoded texts for testing

Source: R/data.R
data_char_encodedtexts.Rd

data_char_encodedtexts is a 10-element character vector with 10 different encodings

data_char_encodedtexts

Format

An object of class character of length 10.

Examples

Encoding(data_char_encodedtexts)
#>  [1] "UTF-8"   "latin1"  "bytes"   "bytes"   "bytes"   "bytes"   "bytes"  
#>  [8] "bytes"   "bytes"   "unknown"
data.frame(labelled = names(data_char_encodedtexts),
           detected = encoding(data_char_encodedtexts)$all)
#> Probable encoding: UTF-8
#>    (but other encodings also detected)
#>   Encoding proportions: 
#> [****************--------........~~~~~~~aaaaaaabbbbbcccccddddd]
#> 
#>   Samples of the first text as:
